problem.markdown: >>What can you put into the "link" in this tool?<< ( ) Just links (x) Any HTML ( ) Any HTML up to 25 pixels tall [explanation] The div with the data-time attribute can theoretically contain any HTML, but realistically there's only so much space available. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: What can you put into the "link" in this tool?

choicegroup.choice: Any HTML up to 25 pixels tall

div.p: The div with the data-time attribute can theoretically contain any HTML, but realistically there's only so much space available.
